Text: Va e Mini-image ?

It is a image made from original game (usually with alcohol). All the files have been removed so the size is about 50Kb-100Kb. You can find mini-images to Starforce 3 Games in most GameFix places.
The games I mentioned above have all mini-images in the net.Only mini-image works with this release. I Might post mini-images to some games here. Just give me a minute.
Haha, so what you are saying, is that the same game occupying 700 mb takes place on a 50-100 kb file?
Of course you install the game from original or downloaded disc/discs, but when the game checks the cd(when playing), only mini-image is needed. Do not be stupid.
LOL! Jesus H Christ, won't people start thinking BEFORE they write stupid questions...

Superb release!
It works perfectly on GTR
Awesome.
Many thanks to SniperFin
Merry Christmas
